summary: This document is a compilation of three daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, for Monday, July 8, 2019. It details routine operations, inmate counts, and movements, including the court appearance and return of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76318-054). The logs also note an inmate at a local hospital under USMS guard.

events.title: Epstein's Court Appearance
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (476318-054/76318-054) was taken out to court at 1:20 PM and returned to the facility at 5:49 PM.

events.title: Routine Facility Operations and Counts
events.description: The MCC conducted multiple institutional counts, body alarm tests, equipment checks, and logged inmate movements throughout the day.

events.title: Fire System Malfunction
events.description: The fire suppression pump went down at 4:30 PM, requiring the institution to conduct fire watch protocol.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 8, 2019, with register number 76318-054.
Epstein was taken out to court on July 8, 2019, departing at 1:20 PM and returning to the MCC at 5:49 PM.
Upon his return from court, Epstein was moved from housing unit 'ZA' to 'HA'.
Another inmate, Cherry (register number 76218-054), was at a local hospital under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS) throughout the day.
The document is a routine operational log showing standard prison procedures like counts, equipment checks, and inmate movements on a specific day.
